website_summaries.verdict: An affordable papaya peel by a reliable and respected brand that is known for clean ingredients and tantalizing tropical scents.
pros: In just 5 minutes, this all-natural, vegetarian-friendly mask dissolves impurities and shrinks pores while restoring shine to the skin’s surface
Mild formula filled with kelp extract, bromelain, and awapuhi provides a tingle minus the irritation
cons: Those with sensitive or allergy-prone skin find the burning sensation to be too strong for certain skin types

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for aging skin
customer_reviews.text: I am 66 years old, and have been using this mask for a few years now. It helps fade the darkened areas that appear on my skin, and helps take away raised spots I get too. I know it works as occasionally I run out or forget to use for a while, and the dark areas and raised bumpy spots come right back. Highly recommended for aging skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for non sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin, not sensitive at all. Actually I have the polar opposite of sensitive skin and This mask can still burn like a mf so please be careful. However this has instantly taken the edge off very dark pimple scarring. Over long term it totally fades discoloration but after 1 use I saw a marked difference
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Ross

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for flakiness.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this peel/mask. I tend to get a little bit of flakiness from using retin-a and when I do, I use this and it smooths my skin right up. Love that is is cruelty free and organic!
customer_reviews.author: Tlbyker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this facemask three times so far and I love it! It smells amazing and my skin feels brighter and cleaner after each use. You only need a small amount for each application, so the tub should last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Snead

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin glow.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years. Love the smell, texture, tingle and results. Makes my skin glow, helps calm it down it I have any issues. Will never not use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meme me

customer_reviews.title: Great for minimizing dark spots
customer_reviews.text: Used this mask nightly & it was great for minimizing dark spots. I do have sensitive skin though & some times it would be a little irritating, so I would say to be careful of that. Would recommend to use every other night or once a week for extra sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT ♥️
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask so much! My skin feels so incredibly soft and radiant after i use it! I use it twice or three times a week! And I noticed results right after yhe first use! It stings a little bit when applied and I rinse after 5 minutes! I feel like my skin has been really good since I introduced this mask to my routine! And i would follow with a sheet mask and I believe my skin will be sooo ready to absorb the hydration after being gently exfoliated by the enzymes from the mask! You have to be careful if you have sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Alaa hamadto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this mask. When I received this and opened the jar I gave it a stir. It looked like it had settled in the transit. I have been buying this in little packets and buy them anywhere I can find them so I’m so pleased to have a jar. This is a nice product. Clean your face really well then apply a light coat. Wait the recommended time and rinse. It exfoliates through the enzyme action and it’s not abrasive, which is good if you have sensitive skin. The smell is subtle and there are no harsh ingredients. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Mostly Natural Ingredients. No Adverse Effects. And Seems to Work!
customer_reviews.text: I mean, that's about all you can ask for in a product, right? Cheap. All (or mostly all) natural ingredients. No adverse effects. And works! Am just trying to improve face appearance after years of battling an inflammatory/auto immune condition took a toll on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Health Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Pick-me-up for your skin
customer_reviews.text: I liked this mask. I put it on my clean, dry face and relaxed in the tub as it went to work. I could feel a little tingling sensation. It was easy to rinse off and not messy at all. My skin looked fresh afterward. I'll be using it again tonight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell if it made any difference
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several months and have not been able to discern any difference it has made. I'll use it up, but I'm unlikely to purchase it again. After reading reviews of other products and seeing that people sometimes have a bad reaction, I can say with certainty that I have had NO bad reactions from this product -- no rashes, itchiness, or other unpleasant experiences. It goes on nicely, is a relatively pleasant experience for five minutes, washes off OK -- but afterward I don't see or feel any difference to skin texture, etc.
customer_reviews.author: KLBG Marin

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand but this product DOES NOTHING
customer_reviews.text: I walk the dog and exercise a lot outdoors in hot weather. Used this to start taking extra care of my skin, specifically to clean out and minimize pores. I love this brand, love the spray sunscreen and would happily try other products but as someone else noted in the reviews, it does nothing. I tried a few other expensive and cheap products I have and they are all working and pretty fast. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: sheri strykowski

customer_reviews.title: Works Fast in 5 Minutes!
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've purchased other masks that removed dead flaky skin from the face. This one goes a bit further. I noticed it also cleaned the pores on my nose. It is a bit tingly but I didn't have an negative reactions. Your best bet if you have sensitive skin is to test a little to see if you get a reaction. I found this mask to be very cooling. What I liked about this mask was how quick it works. Most other masks have taken at least 10 minutes to work. So I'm happy with this and will get it again. I found it less irritating than microdermabrasion. ~The Rebecca Review
customer_reviews.author: The Rebecca ReviewTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps clear up my skin & smells great. It lasts for a really long time too since you only need a thin layer. I’ve had the same jar for a couple of months & I use it once or twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brightens skin
customer_reviews.text: I think Freeman's Pineapple Enzyme Mask worked a little better, but they don't make it anymore. This definitely exfoliates, though, and makes skin look brighter and feel softer.
customer_reviews.author: Reader700

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh-mazing!
customer_reviews.text: Not exaggerating... I could tell a HUGE difference after ONE use! My pores have always been big in my T-zone and I constantly have blackheads on my nose. Gone! Large pores and blackheads are gone!!! Also, you should try out the green tea eye gel. It's amazing, too!
customer_reviews.author: aje

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell, thick gel.
customer_reviews.text: I am a skincare junkie and have used all different brands and price ranges. I can't believe how inexpensive this is for how GREAT it works. I don't have very sensitive skin so I use it on my arms for the damage from 1980's sun worship days!! I also use on face as well and love that it lightly exfoliates so that creams absorb better. Smells pleasant and is a heavy gel consistency. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra-Elizabeth Hood

customer_reviews.title: Really nice gentle cleansing
customer_reviews.text: I have used it several times in the past 2 weeks and really appreciate how it removes a layer of dead skin with no irritation-- I have even used it several days in a row. I apply a serum and moisturizer after using and it has been really good at clearing out clogged pores and small blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: MizDeeAustin

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!! I got a sample of it from Whole Foods and instantly fell in love. It’s a nice mask but also I have used it to spot treat. If I’m breaking out in an area I’ll apply a thin film and just leave it overnight. Clears things up pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley & Fred

customer_reviews.title: Awesome facial mask product!
customer_reviews.text: I get blackheads on my nose really bad. My husband thinks its because I wear glasses which I must say, I agree. I use Noxema but they still get really bad. Since I have started using this product, I have fallen in love with it. My blackheads aren't near as bad as they were. They would probably be completely gone if I would be consistent about using it every day or at least every other day. It is easy to use and it only takes 5 minutes. I had one of my teenage sister and brother use it. They loved it. My sister is all about organic most things so it was perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love the feeling on my face after I use the mask.
customer_reviews.text: This mask feels amazing when I use it. And it smells almost like a pina colada! After using the mask for 5-10 minutes my face feels smooth and replenished. It doesn't dry out my sensitive skin and never leaves dry skin spots on my face (which happens often after a mask)! This mask is also has a light gel consistency that doesn't dry too fast or slides off the face. Perfect for those who have acne-prone or sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Meg W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mask!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how much I missed this stuff until I moved and couldn't purchase it at Walmart anymore. Was without for a month and noticed a difference in my skin. While using this, my face is VERY smooth, refined looking and i notice I get less pimples. I also notice post acne marks go away a tad bit faster using this 2-3 times a week. I moisturize very well after using so I don't find that it dries me out. But even if you use a light moisturizer, I don't see this being overly drying for you which is great. Will keep purchasing on Amazon, won't let it run out on me again!
customer_reviews.author: Datty

customer_reviews.title: Love this line --I've gone foundation free..
customer_reviews.text: I use this mask after the shower and leave it on longer than the recommended five minutes. Afterwards, I moisturize with aloe vera gel. This product is a definite game changer. I've recently switched to cruelty free products and with the pandemic going on, I've gone makeup free. I'm not at 100% makeup free since I'm still use eyebrow pencil and lip gloss, but this mask has helped me appreciate my skin and stop wearing foundation. The small jar will last awhile even with daily use. This is a wonderful line!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Raven

customer_reviews.title: Such a great exfoliating face mask
customer_reviews.text: Such a great exfoliating face mask. I have sensitive skin and this product will occasional burn but, only for a moment and for the right reasons! It's killing off the dead skin cells as it's suppose to. I use this 2-3 times a week and will continue to purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: MRS

customer_reviews.title: Great facial mask
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by this product. It has a lobely light scent and is organic. The enzymes do a great job of lightky exfoliating my face. It is so light I even allow my daughter to use it as well. Apply for 5 minutes, rinse and dry your face with a microfiber cloth. It seems to bring out a lovely glow to our skin. We use it 2x weekly. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Outing

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Be Without This Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m huge fan of this product! I don’t use anything else from this brand. I’ve tried products from them before and were disappointed but this is a must for me. It’s exfoliates my face really well and while it’s strong it’s also gentle. The ingredients are similar to what estheticians recommend but at a really great price. I’m on my second jar now. It’s last a while and doesn’t need to used too often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: This mask may not be as heavy duty as the really expensive enzyme masks, but it still does a good job! People have mentioned that it hurt their face, but I really really have not noticed this and I have sensitive skin. This mask gently removes dead skin from my face and I find I can use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Corley

customer_reviews.title: Healthy glow
customer_reviews.text: I got this mask in replacement for the sheet masks. The price is good so I wanted to give it a try. I put it for 10 min all over my face and neck, afterwards my skin is glowing in a healthy way. I have oily skin pro acne, mid 30s and this mask gives me a healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: Maleny Luna

customer_reviews.title: Good for sunburns
customer_reviews.text: Feels a bit like slime on your face. I would recommend getting a face mask spatula for this product. I'm happy with the way it leaves on skin feeling after. I did take it with me on vacation where I had heavy sun exposure. Used it on my sunburn area and it helped quite a bit with the pain and healing. I will be getting this again.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Trombly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dry out your face.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter tore into this before I used it. I'm used to peel off or clay masques and I like my skin a bit on the dryer side. This didn't do much to tighten my skin; but, I'm old. This won't dry out your face and it's soothing. I may have to use it longer to see any real impact.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Okay but...
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings! I have combination/acne skin Pros: Moisturizing, feels like a peel, really does the work and plumps the skin Cons: doesn’t help with oily skin, can’t use the product when I have acne(which is 90% of the times) because it BURNS! Too harsh for active acne skin!! So I try to apply on spots with no acne to help with scarring
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: This product worked OK on my skin because it did exfoliate the dull surface skin, but I didn't notice any real difference in how clean my pores were (I have very large pores, FWIW). You need to follow the instructions and not leave it on the skin too long or else the skin can get a minor chemical burn (your skin will feel irritated).
customer_reviews.author: InveterateShopper

customer_reviews.title: The best enzyme mask ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite enzyme mask. I tried other brands, one was more than 10 times the price which did not work nearly as well as Alba!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a nice facial mask
customer_reviews.text: I really love Alba products and have many of them. I trust the brand and their products don't irritate my skin and they always smell really good! I don't usually use facial masks but decided to treat myself. I loved it. It leaves my skin really soft and feeling firm and tight but not like dried out tight, really soft. I only use it about once or twice a week. You need to use more than if you were just putting on moisturizer but not too much and so its going to last awhile even though its a small jar. I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle exfoliator for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite peel that I have been using for over 5 years. It is gentle and fits my sensitive skin's needs. The peel is easy to use and it give a nice glow to the skin afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: lion_19

customer_reviews.title: Great product to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. The place I used to get it stopped carrying it, and I liked it well enough to search for it on amazon. I’ve used it for years and my face looks better, complexion brighter, when I’m using it. If you’ve ever peeled from retinols and had to moisturize and get the sloughing skin off, this helps great with that too! *I have sensitive skin, both blemish-prone and aging. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand it always smells amazing and this product did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: B. Boulette

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: INCREDIBLE RESULTS!!!! No seriously, I can’t even believe how pore-less my skin is after just one use. Been using it every other day for almost two weeks now, and have barely scraped the surface of the jar. This will last forever and it’s the only mask that actually produces results!!! I’m telling everyone about it 🥰🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Houde

customer_reviews.title: radiance in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Just used it today and my skin looks fresh and dewey. It feels clean. I have sensitive skin so I am always nervous about using masks and other products on my face. Although this did sting/tingle a bit, my skin is not irritated once removed. My skin looks just fine; it looks radiant! This will be something I will use twice weekly. The smell is also extremely pleasant. So happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: smaller than i thought but that’s my fault
customer_reviews.text: i should’ve looked at the size but this works really nicely
customer_reviews.author: jennifersolares

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and works well on moderately sensitive skin. Tingles at first, but numbs skin and does not irritate skin. Sloughs dead ski and leaves it clean and soft. If you use prior to blackhead removal or blackhead mask/scrub, it is an amazing primer to get your pores gently and squeaky clean! Also cheaper on amazon than in most stores.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Days

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing smell, like fruit loops!! Leaves my skin feeling soft and no irritation. I have a “blended” face, some parts are dry and some parts are oily. I use the alba wash, moisturizer, and mask. It’s really helped calm everything down
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Montrone

customer_reviews.title: Not really impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I was not really impressed with this product. I didn't see any significant changes to my skin after three applications.
customer_reviews.author: jazz

customer_reviews.title: Apply to a washed face so product reaches into the pores
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for lifting residue from skin. Its like exfoliating with out the scrub. Leaves skin super clean but never super dry. I’ve used it for years. I love it. Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Really love this quick 5 min mask. I keep it in the fridge, so it feels when I apply it to my face. Quick 5 mins, and it really brightens me up. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Spdy1186

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic mask
customer_reviews.text: I use this every so often when my skin is actively flaring up. It's not the strongest mask I've used, but it does a good job of calming down my skin when I'm having a lot of breakouts. I do notice my acne drying up a little faster than normal after using it but it's no magical cure. Overall, I like the cooling feeling I get using this, and it only requires 5 minutes of my time. I'm on my 2nd jar and plan to continue using it unless I find something else that's better for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: No effect whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: There was no effect after my first use of this mask. This isn't a product described as "better for the skin over time" so I'm pretty sure I wasted my money. Damn ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great and it is gentle on my skin mostly..it initially tingles/burns a little when I apply it at first but my skin is left in better condition than it previously was, so I'm not really complaining.
customer_reviews.author: TeeW

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Works wonders. Love this product. My skin has been looking dry and dull. After reading reviews, I purchased this. Just used it last night and I’m so impressed. My new go-to mask!
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Performs as expected
customer_reviews.text: I really like this gel mask. It smells very pleasant and works exactly as promised, quick and my not-so-young skin feels great after.
customer_reviews.author: 1happyhikinchik

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Product smells nice and is easy to use. Stays wet and does not dry out. I have oily skin that can be sensitive at times, but this mask did not bother me. Seems to help with pore tightening. I have left it on for up to a few hours because it is so soothing on irritated, problem skin. Will continue to use and maybe up the frequency per week. Note: Product can also be found at your local grocery store. Have seen it on the shelf at Giant Stores and Wegman's, but you get the 2-pack bundle pricing through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Fave13

customer_reviews.title: Burns eyes No difference on skin thus far still waiting
customer_reviews.text: Burns eyes No difference on skin thus far still waiting
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use it before a shower and it helps to relax for just a few minutes... only thing and it’s not bad just different is it is not like normal face mask and drys this one stays wet
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for more of a thick hydrogel. This is like putting slow on your face... effective but not instant results
customer_reviews.author: Tandanda Home Spa Services

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my skin type.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the smell of it, but I have very sensitive facial skin and it burned and made my cheeks ruby red. I'm not saying it is a bad product, just not good for my skin. I'm bald, so I'm using it on my head. No redness there.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to love this product but it made me break out really bad. I never get acne and when I used this I had horrible rashes on my cheeks, smells delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks great bu
customer_reviews.text: I do like this a lot but I don't feel like it makes a huge difference. I use a scrub before then this mask and it makes my pore tingle. My skin looks great the day after but the effects are not long lasting
customer_reviews.author: juliette lyman

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is fine. It has a nice pineapple scent and a thick gel like consistency. I do not feel any tingling or burning when I use it but my face is used to alpha hydroxyl and lactic acid. It is a fun way to pamper yourself but it doesn't give my skin any noticeable results.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Darton

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Been using it for years. Leaves your skin glowing. Gentle, no sting. You’ll see a major change after just one use. Mostly clear so you can sleep in it w/o ruining your sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Sandwich

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Cool, refreshing mask that never disappoints. I've repurchased this 2-3 times now.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: good skin care addition
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on a fluke but I came back for more. Very tingly at first, but gently exfoliates like I need it to. Thumbs up for me.
customer_reviews.author: TeeW

customer_reviews.title: Alba Papaya Mask
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 2 stars because it does more harm than good. Has a great smell and made my face glowing, but, it did irritate my skin and I'm a person who doesn't easily break out to any skin products. It dried out some areas on my cheeks, chin and forehead. It also broke me out in this little red bumps. I only used this product twice - once each week and I don't know...maybe I was just one of the unlucky ones.
customer_reviews.author: Medusa

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your skin feeling and looking smooth and silky
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff why didn't I buy it sooner! It leaves my skin feeling so refreshed and smooth and silky definitely will be buying more. I have very sensitive skin and it worked amazing.
customer_reviews.author: ANGIE

customer_reviews.title: wake up sleepy skin
customer_reviews.text: This impressed me. I really like how it feels on my skin and after one use my skin felt brighter and smoother. I think this would be a good skin to wake your face up in the morning. It feels kind of like aloe, it's a gel in that way, and it smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and got a great deal on Amazon. It's hard to find in the store and if they do carry it, itbis about double the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Harms

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good, skin feels baby smooth and works on my sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my face. My dermatologist and aesthetician said I can no longer use beads or walnut scrub as an exfoliant in my late 30's. Both said that this product (in my price point) was a fantastic alternative.
customer_reviews.author: NE0831

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Does not do much for ones skin. Better off spending a little more for a product that actually works
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline keily

customer_reviews.title: Alba mask
customer_reviews.text: Little bit tingly when you put it in your face but does give a good deep clean
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this it really hydrates my face! Perfect for all skin types I think!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Spend some extra money
customer_reviews.text: Spend some extra money and buy products that have active ingredients in them. I bought it to show clients the difference between otc products and professional
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Not a peep.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t act as a peel or enzyme - I even left on for 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: amzonlyshopping

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask for breaking down and removing dead skin cells
customer_reviews.text: I like this enzyme facial mask and would recommend it. The mask is too strong for me to use on a daily basis, but perfect for once or twice a week. My go to mask for pulling junk out of my pores is Mary Kay's formula #2 mask. The Alba papaya mask is a great mask for breaking down and removing dead skin cells.
customer_reviews.author: FrenchKitchen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Fast and effective for my skin type.
customer_reviews.author: N. J.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad and is sticky, does absolutely nothing for skin
customer_reviews.author: 4m1r

customer_reviews.title: Best mask out there
customer_reviews.text: Best mask I’ve ever used, and I’ve used a lot! I have clogged pores and nothing was working. This had 90% unclogged after one use! It didn’t dry the skin out, it smells amazing but not heavy scented, it’s perfect! I look forward to buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Adams

customer_reviews.title: Meh......
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately mine came broken, and I also had an allergic reaction towards it; which is weird cause I use the face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: works like crazy...yeah!!
customer_reviews.text: The product works like crazy..no irritation...scent minimal but unscented would be preferable
customer_reviews.author: erda

customer_reviews.title: Too Harsh for Me
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and the ingredients, but this product left my skin flushed and burning for quite awhile after I'd used it as directed and rinsed it off. I'm in my 50s with normal skin. It might make more sense for someone with younger or oilier skin, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: book lady

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from Amazon and someone stole it off of my front step. I was planning on repurchasing however, my husband surprised me and bought it. Paula's review did not rate it very high so I was a little apprehensive. However, I really like this. It smells great, is easy to use, and brightened my skin. It is very gentle. I have never had a real chemical or professional peel. Being 35 I am suddenly realizing I am not a spring chicken and really need to start being proactive with the whole aging process. UGH. This so far has been a great starting point for me. I find it easy, gentle and seems to work. I def recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy for the forgetful mom
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quick pick-me-up for my exhausted mom skin and this did it. It softens my complexion and shrinks up my crater-sized pores. Plus, it only takes five minutes. This is not a mask you have to wear all night or even twenty minutes. I can put it on while I dry my hair, wipe it off, and finish my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: TwoCatsAndCounting

customer_reviews.title: Stings a little, but not overwhelmingly so
customer_reviews.text: Love using this weekly when I want to mask after my skin care regimen
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: I love this face mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this face mask! And it's so much cheaper on amazon than in cvs drugstore. It does burn a little when I first put it on but it soon disappates and leaves my skin feeling fresh. Definitely heed the directions advice of only using a very thin layer of it, a little bit goes a long way. And it can be difficult to rinse off if you use too much!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great mask! My skin is better because of it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask!! It really does clearnthe dead and congested skin. I would definitely recommend it. My skin is no longer dull or congested. It is healthy and more plump than ot has been in years. I want more people to buy it so that it is not discontinued!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda W

customer_reviews.title: Only 1, NOT 3!!
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as package of 3 but I only received 1
customer_reviews.author: Elissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mask without a bunch of chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Clears up dull skin in 5 mins! I use it once a week and neutralize it with a facial cream before remove with my face cleanser. Works really fast.
customer_reviews.author: H.P.J

customer_reviews.title: I felt in love with the mask
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to try this mask so I finally bought one. From my first use, I felt in love with the mask. It is very hydrating! My face feels tight and fresh after using this product. Excellent facial mask.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask!!! Deep cleansing and still makes your skin soft and supple.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: First time using it and I was like 'WOW'. Noticed tighter, smoother and clearer skin. I'm definitely ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Dye

customer_reviews.title: Like the expensive stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. Our esthetician uses a expensive enzyme treatment. I looked up the ingredients online and saw the active ingredient was papaya. I found this for $11 and thought it was worth a try. It works great. Mild fragrance and a little tingle. Cleans pores and leaves a glow. Use it several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Foxglove

customer_reviews.title: Box looks awful! Can’t give this as a gift!! 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: I love this product & purchased another one as a gift, however who can give a gift when the packaging looks like this?!?! This is awful!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Stings a little but works really well
customer_reviews.text: It stings when you put it on. I wasn't too sure about it initially. But have to admit that my face feels smooth and moisturized after use. Leaving it on for 5 minutes is all it takes.
customer_reviews.author: House Wife

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff! My favorite mask! Leaves your skin glowing and feeling refreshed, even better than dermalogica and only a fourth of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom and she said she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Tehzeeb Raina

customer_reviews.title: It's not uncomfortable at all for my pain tolerance level and it leaves your skin super smooth. It's a permanent and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: It didn't tingle the first time but every time since I definitely feel it. It's not uncomfortable at all for my pain tolerance level and it leaves your skin super smooth. It's a permanent and inexpensive addition to my routine.
customer_reviews.author: surfergirl

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a gel
customer_reviews.text: Smells kind of nice but I don’t see Themis product doing anything to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loyal customer
customer_reviews.text: My got to products for both during and after pregnancy
customer_reviews.author: Shari Brown

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS FACIAL MASK
customer_reviews.text: ALBA HAS BEEN A GREAT PRODUCT FOR ME AND I'M SURE IT'S GOOD FOR ALL SKIN TYPES AS IT IS BASICALLY AN ALL NATURAL PRODUCT. THE MASK IS GREAT FEELS COOL AND SOOTHING A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY BUT I'VE ONLY USED IT 2 TIMES SO I CAN'T TELL YOU I LOOK 21 AGAIN. AT LEAST NOT YET. I RECOMMEND ALL ALBA PRODUCTS. GOOD PRICE AT THIS SITE.
customer_reviews.author: THE BEST!!

customer_reviews.title: Cleansing and good product.
customer_reviews.text: I got this facial cleanse for self care and it didn’t disappoint me. It has helped my face a lot. I feel lighter and happier using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. It was described as a pealing mask, it is not. Also even though I never left it on more than the 5 min. it did make red blotches on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Alba Botanica Pore-Fecting Papaya Enzyme Hawaiian Facial Mask, 3 oz.
product_meta.description: Flavor:Papaya Enzyme| Size:1Take your complexion from dull to radiant with Alba Botanica Pore-Fecting Papaya Enzyme Hawaiian Facial Mask. This five-minute treatment removes impurities with papaya and pineapple extracts to reveal fresh, vibrant skin. Our botanical ingredients minimize the appearance of pores for a smoother complexion and nourished skin. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates, harsh sulfates or synthetic fragrances. It is also not tested on animals. Includes one 0.3 oz. single-use Alba Botanica Pore-Fecting Papaya Enzyme Hawaiian Facial Mask. At Alba Botanica, our product family constantly evolves alongside health, beauty, and ingredient knowledge and trends. We’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. Do beautiful – that’s the motto that motivates our body loving products that nourish the skin, hair and, of course, the soul.
feature_bullets: One 0.3 oz. single-use Alba Botanica Hawaiian Pore-Fecting Papaya Enzyme Facial Mask
Five-minute treatment dissolves away dull skin and impurities
Made with pore-refining pineapple and skin-brightening papaya enzymes
No parabens, phthalates, harsh sulfates or synthetic fragrances

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
